Text: I'm pretty sure this is just brown sugar. It is not like Sucanat. I gave it away.

Buy it at your local grocery store, you will get it at least 10 days sooner, and with less stress.
They sell this same size can at my sam's club for $34.28.  It is crazy to charge $47!
This is basically a can of potatoes and cream.  If you're lucky you may get 3-5 tiny pieces of clam.
I prefer the no sugar added dried mango. This has no mango taste and the sugar is bad for you.
Kitty would not eat this.  We gave the whole pack to our animal shelter.
ogs would not touch this dog food.. They will only eat Ceasers.. I guess it was just a cheap food..
Not what I was looking for, I don't want farmed seafood...who knows what "by-products" they are fed.
Dense, flavorless, chalky, barely edible. Nothing about it reminds me of s Turtle.
I've loved these things for years... but I won't buy any more!  They're now being MADE IN MEXICO.

This horchata mix tastes nothing like horchata. There are  better alternatives if you want horchata.

my kids like all of the flavors but chocolate.  They say they just don't taste very good.

This drink is okay. I thought it would taste more fruity. It tastes more carbonated and more fizzie.

so so.there was great reviews on product only made it once will try it again

A nice little gift, but it's not going to get you the gift-giver of the year award or anything!
Did not care for their organic green tea at all, but their fruit teas are the best.
The taste is OK. ive only tried it once and then it went in my pantry and it has been sitting there.
there is a little chemical kick but not to bad, as far a keurig goes this is the way to buy

Well, I was envious when I gave this my dog.  It really does smell good and he loves it.
